column2: Construct an ontology focused on the following: grandmother. Provide it in valid Turtle/RDF format, excluding any extra text.
column3: @prefix rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> .@prefix rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> .@prefix xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> .@prefix foaf: <http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/> .@prefix rel: <http://purl.org/vocab/relationship/> .rel:grandmother a rdfs:Class ;    rdfs:label "Grandmother"@en ;    rdfs:comment "A female parent of a parent."@en ;    rdfs:subClassOf foaf:Person ;.<#Alice> a foaf:Person ;    foaf:name "Alice"@en ;    foaf:gender "female"@en ;    rel:grandmother <#Bob> ;.<#Bob> a foaf:Person ;    foaf:name "Bob"@en ;    foaf:gender "male"@en ;    rel:childOf <#Charlie> ;.<#Charlie> a foaf:Person ;    foaf:name "Charlie"@en ;    foaf:gender "male"@en ;    rel:childOf <#Alice> ;.
